attributes.action: MQM's UK based leadership openly threatening Pakistanis
attributes.additional_details:
Altaf Hussain, The UK based leader of the MQM has openly threatened the citizens of Karachi with violence unless they discontinue their protests against widespread rigging of the elections held on the 11th of May 2013 (link to speech below).

We request the British Government to debate the issue of severe threats from Altaf Hussain against the citizens of Karachi. Altaf Hussain is known to follow on similar threats issued in the past.

Link to Altaf Hussain's threats - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pnJPoDU-Bu0
